Message.Msg: It's your funeral if you think it will be going anywhere near that level.

We'll first off they would have to have earnings to have a P/E, otherwise you have a negative number which essentially translates to NA, Not Available, i.e. it does not exist but if you want to hear the goofiest laugh in the world find a recording of Jeff Bezos as he sold 1M shares roughly a week ago for a cool $300M and then spent most of that to buy the Washington Post. Read this nemesis guy's posts and he'll guide you to exactly how the investment cycle goes at Amazon and when they may actually make some money. He has absolutely no clue but that doesn't stop him from throwing baloney around on this board. He's all knowing according to him. It's kind of the Amazon way. Baffle them with you Bvll$hit, you know what I mean. "We continue to work heads down, blah, blah, blah" all the while guiding numbers down and down further while Bezos has cornered the market on stock manipulation upward. No, to be honest he hasn't there's been a lot of it lately in other MOMOs but Amazon has done it forever,so if you like Amazon don't worry about the price, there's bigger fool HFT algo bot right behind you that wants to buy.
